xp_system.xp_channel_description: Channel where XP can be earned
xp_system.level_roles_description: Configure roles that are automatically assigned when users reach specific levels. Users will only receive the HIGHEST level role they qualify for. Use the sync button to update all existing users retroactively.

index.title: Maybee Dashboard
index.subtitle: Professional Discord bot management made easy. Configure your server settings, view analytics, and manage your community with our intuitive web interface.
index.features_subtitle: Powerful features designed to enhance your Discord server
index.feature_xp_description: Engage your community with a comprehensive XP system, leaderboards, and role rewards that keep members active and motivated.
index.feature_moderation_description: Keep your server safe with automated moderation tools, custom filters, and detailed logging for all administrative actions.
index.feature_welcome_description: Create personalized welcome experiences for new members with customizable messages and automated role assignments.
index.feature_analytics_description: Gain insights into your server's activity with detailed statistics, member engagement metrics, and growth tracking.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.subtitle: How we collect, use and protect your information

section1.title: 1. Information We Collect
section1.content1: We collect the following information when you use our service:
section1.data5: ‚Ä¢ Messages and interactions with the bot

section3.title: 3. Information Sharing
section3.content1: We do not sell your personal information. We may share your information in the following cases:
section3.share3: ‚Ä¢ To protect our rights and security

section4.title: 4. Data Security
section4.content1: We take the security of your data seriously:
section4.content2: We use appropriate security measures to protect your information.

section5.title: 5. Data Retention
section5.content1: We retain your information as long as necessary to:
section5.title: ‚Ä¢ Comply with legal obligations

section6.title: 6. Your Rights
section6.right5: ‚Ä¢ Object to processing of your data

section7.title: 7. Cookies and Similar Technologies
section7.content1: We use cookies to improve your experience:
section7.title: ‚Ä¢ Analytics cookies to understand usage
section7.content1: ‚Ä¢ Preference cookies to remember your choices

section8.title: 8. Changes to This Policy
section8.content1: We may modify this privacy policy:
section8.content2: ‚Ä¢ We will notify you of significant changes
section8.title: ‚Ä¢ The updated version will be published on this page
section8.content1: ‚Ä¢ We encourage you to review this policy regularly

section9.title: 9. Contact
section9.content1: If you have questions about this policy:
section9.title: ‚Ä¢ Send us a private message
section9.content1: ‚Ä¢ We will respond as soon as possible

section10.title: 10. GDPR Compliance
section10.content1: This policy complies with the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR):
section10.title: ‚Ä¢ Your rights are protected under European legislation
section10.content1: ‚Ä¢ We have implemented appropriate protection measures

section11.title: 11. Children's Data
section11.content1: We do not knowingly collect information from minors:
section11.content2: ‚Ä¢ If you are under 16, ask for parental permission
section11.title: ‚Ä¢ Parents can request deletion of their children's data

terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.subtitle: Rules and conditions for using our service

section1.title: 1. Acceptance of Terms
section1.content1: By using our service, you accept these terms:
section1.content2: ‚Ä¢ You have read and understood these terms
section1.title: ‚Ä¢ You agree to be bound by these terms
section1.content1: ‚Ä¢ You confirm you have legal authority to accept these terms

section2.title: 2. Service Description
section2.content2: ‚Ä¢ A Discord bot with various features
section2.title: ‚Ä¢ A web dashboard for configuration

section3.title: 3. Acceptable Use
section3.prohibited1: ‚Ä¢ Use the service for illegal purposes

section4.title: 4. User Account
section4.content2: ‚Ä¢ You must have a valid Discord account
section4.title: ‚Ä¢ You are responsible for your account security
section4.content1: ‚Ä¢ You must inform us of any unauthorized use

section5.title: 5. Intellectual Property
section5.content1: The service and its content are protected:
section5.content2: ‚Ä¢ By copyright and other intellectual property laws
section5.title: ‚Ä¢ You may not copy or distribute our content
section5.content1: ‚Ä¢ You retain rights to content you create

section6.title: 6. Limitation of Liability
section6.content2: ‚Ä¢ We do not guarantee uninterrupted service
section6.title: ‚Ä¢ We are not responsible for indirect damages
section6.content1: ‚Ä¢ Our total liability is limited to the amount you paid

section7.title: 7. Suspension and Termination
section7.content1: We may suspend or terminate your access:
section7.content2: ‚Ä¢ In case of violation of these terms
section7.title: ‚Ä¢ For security reasons

section8.title: 8. Changes to Terms
section8.content2: ‚Ä¢ We will notify you of significant changes
section8.title: ‚Ä¢ The updated version will be published on this page

section9.title: 9. Governing Law
‚Ä¢ Any dispute will be subject to French courts
section9.content1: ‚Ä¢ If a clause is invalid, the others remain in force
